title: SOLD Lower Grade T206s Mathewson, McGraw, Tenney and more

posts.post_title: SOLD Lower Grade T206s Mathewson, McGraw, Tenney and more
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following T206s for sale. All have nice fronts. All have damage on the backs. Paper loss and pencil marks. 

Priced as marked.

Christy Mathewson, Sweet Caporal 350, $275.00 SOLD
John McGraw, Finger in the air, Piedmont 150, $50.00 SOLD
Fred Tenny, Sweet Caporal 150, $25.00 SOLD
Art Devlin, Sweet Caporal 150, $25.00 SOLD
Jake Weimer, Piedmont 150, $25.00 SOLD
Bugs Raymond, Piedmont 350, $25.00 SOLD
Moose McCormick, Piedmont 350, $20.00 SOLD
Admiral Schlei, Polar Bear, $20.00 SOLD

Please add $3.50 for shipping.

Paypal, check or money order are all okay.

The first response with a commitment to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking,

Joe

I'll take them all.

Sent from my SM-G930V using Tapatalk
